content: Excluding certain City Gear acquisition and integration expenses and pandemic related impairment and valuation costs that occurred last year, current year SG&A expense of 21.5% of net sales reflected an improvement of approximately 110 basis points from adjusted SG&A expense of 22.6% over the first nine months of last year. Excluding all non-GAAP adjustments in the prior fiscal year, our year-to-date operating profit of $205.1 million, representing 15.7% of net sales, is comparable to adjusted operating profit of $110.2 million or 10.6% of net sales over the first nine months of last year.
